solution_line_template: Jean already bought {cupcakes_per_pack_15} cupcakes x {packs_of_15_bought} packs = <<{cupcakes_per_pack_15}*{packs_of_15_bought}={cupcakes_from_15_packs}>>{cupcakes_from_15_packs} cupcakes.
